translated: The Paṭṭhāna🔽The Paṭṭhāna, in the form of the Duka Paṭṭhāna, is given in the form of a table.

original: 14.23. Cetasikadukādi🔽Cetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.🔽Cittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….🔽Cittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… aññamaññe cha, purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: cetasika duka ādi  cetasikam dhammam paṭicca na cetasikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava  citta sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na citta sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  citta sasaṭṭham dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭhaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta  hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā pañca pe aññamaññe cha purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate nava

original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam dhammam paṭicca na citta samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta 🔽hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava adhipatiyā pañca pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava

original: Cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittānuparivattiṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe…
analyzed: citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pe citta anuparivatti  dhammam paṭicca na citta anuparivattī dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe  dhammam paṭicca na citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe
translated: A mind-concomitant element arises with mind as condition … A non-mind-concomitant element arises with mind as condition … A mind-follower🔽element arises with mind as condition … A non-mind-follower element arises with mind as condition … An associated origination element connected with mind arises with mind as condition … A non-associated origination element connected with mind arises with mind as condition … An associated origination element co-arisen with mind arises with mind as condition … A non-associated origination element co-arisen with mind arises with mind as condition …

original: cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.🔽Ajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca na citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī 🔽dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā 🔽nava pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava 🔽ajjhattikam dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: Dependent on a state that is conascent with consciousness, a state not conascent with consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is a mental factor, a state that is not a mental factor arises … Dependent on a state that is associated with consciousness, a state that is not associated with consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is dissociated from consciousness, a state that is dissociated from consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is conjoined with consciousness, a state that is conjoined with consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is not conjoined with consciousness, a state that is not conjoined with consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is supported by consciousness, a state that is supported by consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is not supported by consciousness, a state that is not supported by consciousness arises … Dependent on a state that is supported by nutriment, a state that is supported by nutriment arises … Dependent on a state that is not supported by nutriment, a state that is not supported by nutriment arises … Dependent on a state that is a faculty, a state that is a faculty arises … Dependent on a state that is not a faculty, a state that is not a faculty arises … Dependent on a state that is a resultant, a state that is a resultant arises … Dependent on a state that is not a resultant, a state that is not a resultant arises … Dependent on a state that is not karmically acquired, a state that is not karmically acquired arises … Dependent on a state that is karmically acquired, a state that is karmically acquired arises … Dependent on a state that is a condition, a state that is a condition arises … Dependent on a state that is not a condition, a state that is not a condition arises … Dependent on a state that is a condition and a state that is not a condition, a state that is a condition arises … Dependent on a state that is a condition and a state that is not a condition, a state that is not a condition arises … Dependent on a state that is a condition and a state that is a condition, a state that is a condition arises … Dependent on a state that is a condition and a state that is a condition, a state that is not a condition arises … Dependent on a state that is a condition and a state that is a condition, a state that is a condition and a state that is not a condition arise … Dependent on a state that is a condition and a state that is a condition, a state that is a

original: Bāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: bāhiram dhammam paṭicca na bāhiraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With an external as condition, a non-external … (three sets of three).

original: Ajjhattikañca bāhirañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane pañca …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: ajjhattikam ca bāhiram ca dhammam paṭicca na ajjhattikaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi  hetuyā nava ārammaṇe pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe purejāte āsevane pañca pe avigate nava
translated: With an internal and an external as condition, a non-internal … (abbreviated).

original: Upādā dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Noupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: upādā dhammam paṭicca noupādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  no upādā dhammam paṭicca na no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With cause as condition, nine; with object as condition, five; with predominance as condition, five … With prior condition, with subsequent condition, five … With non-disappearance as condition, nine.🔽With an clung-to as condition, a non-clung-to …🔽With a non-clung-to as condition, a non-clung-to … (three sets of three).

original: Upādā ca noupādā ca dhammaṁ paṭicca noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: upādā ca no upādā ca dhammam paṭicca no upādā dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe purejāte āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca
translated: With a clung-to and a non-clung-to as condition, a non-clung-to … (abbreviated).

original: Upādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: upādinnam dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With cause as condition, five; with object as condition, three; with predominance as condition, three … With prior condition, with subsequent condition, one … With non-disappearance as condition, five.🔽With an acquired as condition, a non-acquired …

original: Anupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.🔽Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: anupādinnam dhammam paṭicca na anupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā  upādinnam ca anupādinnam ca dhammam paṭicca na aupādinnaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With an unproximate object …🔽With a proximate and an unproximate object …

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)🔽Mahantaradukaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ.
analyzed: hetuyā pañca ārammaṇe dve adhipatiyā ekam pe āsevane ekam pe avigate pañca sabbattha vitthāro 🔽mahantara dukam niṭṭhita
